pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Convenient R Interface with the OpenAI 'ChatGPT' API // A convenient interface with the OpenAI 'ChatGPT' API https://openai.com/api. 'gptr' allows you to interact with 'ChatGPT', a powerful language model, for various natural language processing tasks. The 'gptr' R package makes talking to 'ChatGPT' in R super easy. It helps researchers and data folks by simplifying the complicated stuff, like asking questions and getting answers. With 'gptr', you can use 'ChatGPT' in R without any hassle, making it simpler for everyone to do cool things with language!
